flawed_nl_solution:
Jackson used 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=80/1>>80/1 kilograms of meat to make meatballs.
He had 20 - 80/1 = <<20-80/1=-60>>-60 kilograms of meat left.
So -60 - 3 = <<-60-3=-63>>-63 kilograms of meat are left.
#### -63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 80/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
